DOC.brief_summary: To compare , randomize , single-blinded , cross-over study satiety effect low energy aerate beverage normal energy aerate beverage healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Satiety Effect Very Low Energy Foam With Normal Energy Foams
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study assess low energy foam effect satiety volume reference normal energy foam , test equivalence two foam . Treatment equivalence , meet 90 % confidence interval ( CI ) between-treatment difference appetite AUC within range -5 +5 mm/min reference . Two normal energy foam slightly different composition also compare reference foam test possible effect difference composition ( carbohydrate type , emulsifier ) energy per se . On test day , volunteer arrive clinic fast state consume standardize 250 kcal breakfast . Subjects receive one four test product 2.5 hour start breakfast consume 400 ml test product spoon within 10 minute . Each subject randomize treatment order accord balance ( Williams type ) design , receive one four test product week 4 week , separate one-week washout period ( consumed week day ) .

Dislike , allergy intolerance test product Eating disorder ( measure SCOFF questionnaire , > 2 `` yes '' response ) High high restrain eater measure Three factor eat questionnaire TFEQ , restriction score > 14 Reported medical treatment may affect eat habits/satiety
